thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Price, Accommodations and Location
thread.title_full: Great Price, Accommodations and Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: uoficpa84679
title: Great Price, Accommodations and Location
text:
Came in for a one day trip...was pleasantly surprised by the accommodations...great value for the money. Decent sized room, clean and excellent extras (microwave, refrigerator). Great location right on Times Square.
Professionally staffed.
One hiccup was housekeeping knocking on the door at 10AM when check out is at noon...no need for the bums' rush out of room 610 on Tuesday.
Otherwise, I would definitely recommend and stay here again.
